short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse Zillow, Redfin, and Realtor properties with ease and pick your next deal with confidence!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A deal or not a deal? How could you know while browsing real estate properties on Zillow, Redfin, and Realtor trying to pick next great investment. Each property analysis takes a lot of time and copy/pasting data from webpage to excel or calculator is a tedious process for hundreds of properties checked daily.

And with REI Lense you can enjoy the thrill of looking for the next great deal with ease and efficiency. Once property details are opened, the extension analyses data, fetches stats and calculates essential metrics, such as Cash on Cash Return, Cap Rate, Median Rent, Cashflow. 

We help busy real estate investors analyze multiple properties daily without tedious spreadsheet calculations, project rental revenue and return on investment, find the right deals, invest confidently, and grow their portfolio. Get your FREE report now!
